requirement_tested: A wheel of fortune interface with visual spinning animation
user_persona: A casual visitor excited to try their luck.
user_goal: To spin the wheel and see a smooth animation indicating the result.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and immediately sees the large Wheel of Fortune centered on the screen with a big SPIN button below it.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The homepage loads successfully, showing the wheel and a dark red SPIN button against a light gray background.

narrative_steps.title: Hovering Over Spin Button
narrative_steps.description: Curious about how it feels, Sarah hovers her mouse over the SPIN button to see if there's any feedback.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the SPIN button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The button slightly increases in size and gains a subtle shadow, providing visual feedback.

narrative_steps.title: Spinning the Wheel
narrative_steps.description: Ready to play, Sarah clicks the SPIN button to start the wheel's rotation.
narrative_steps.action: Click the SPIN button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The wheel begins rotating with a sound effect. The SPIN button becomes disabled during the spin.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Result
narrative_steps.description: After the wheel slows down and stops, Sarah sees the result highlighted and hears a win sound.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for the spin animation to complete.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The wheel stops smoothly on a prize segment. A brief display confirms the result before transitioning to a win confirmation modal or updating the UI accordingly.

requirement_tested: Prize display section showing all available prizes
user_persona: A curious user wanting to know what prizes are available.
user_goal: To view a complete list of all available prizes.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Prize List Page
narrative_steps.description: Mark notices a link to 'All Prizes' and decides to explore what he could potentially win.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'All Prizes' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The prize list page loads, displaying a grid of cards showing images, names, and descriptions of all prizes.

narrative_steps.title: Scrolling Through Prizes
narrative_steps.description: There are many prizes, so Mark scrolls down to see more options.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll vertically through the prize cards.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page scrolls smoothly, revealing additional prize cards as they come into view.

requirement_tested: User winning records page displaying individual history
user_persona: A returning player interested in reviewing past wins.
user_goal: To view a history of previously won prizes.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Win History
narrative_steps.description: Anna remembers winning something last week and wants to check her records.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the '/history' route.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The My Winning History page loads, showing a chronological list of Anna’s previous spins with dates and associated prizes.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Long History
narrative_steps.description: Anna has spun the wheel many times and needs to scroll to see older wins.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll vertically through the history list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Older entries become visible as she scrolls down without performance issues.

requirement_tested: Backend API to manage wheel spins and prize data
user_goal: To verify that backend endpoints respond correctly to frontend requests.

narrative_steps.title: Fetching Prizes
narrative_steps.description: A developer sends a GET request to the prize endpoint to confirm prize data is retrievable.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to /api/prizes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns a JSON array containing all active prize objects with correct schema fields.

narrative_steps.title: Recording a Spin Outcome
narrative_steps.description: After simulating a spin, the developer posts the outcome to record it.
narrative_steps.action: Send POST request to /api/spins with a valid payload.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server responds with success status and stores the spin result in the database.

narrative_steps.title: Retrieving User History
narrative_steps.description: Developer checks whether a specific user’s history can be retrieved.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET request to /api/user/history?identifier=user123.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns a JSON array of spin history records linked to user123.

requirement_tested: Database integration using PostgreSQL with specified environment variables
user_persona: System administrator setting up production deployment.
user_goal: To ensure the app connects properly to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Environment Variables
narrative_steps.description: Admin configures the required environment variables for database connectivity.
narrative_steps.action: Set DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Environment variables are set correctly in the backend runtime context.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Database Connection
narrative_steps.description: Admin runs a test query to validate that the backend can connect to the database.
narrative_steps.action: Run a sample query via backend service to access 'prizes' table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Query executes successfully, returning rows from the prizes table.

requirement_tested: Frontend fetching all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: End-user loading pages with real-time content.
user_goal: To see accurate and updated information pulled from backend services.

narrative_steps.title: Loading the Prize Page
narrative_steps.description: Jamie visits the prize list page expecting to see current offerings.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the /prizes route.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend makes a call to /api/prizes and populates the grid with live prize data.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing User History
narrative_steps.description: Jamie reloads their history page to make sure new wins appear.
narrative_steps.action: Refresh the /history page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New spin results are fetched from /api/user/history and rendered instantly.

requirement_tested: Functionality to record and store user winning results
user_goal: To have their latest win saved and accessible later.

narrative_steps.title: Completing a Spin
narrative_steps.description: After spinning the wheel, Alex wins a prize and expects it to be recorded.
narrative_steps.action: Complete a spin cycle initiated by clicking the SPIN button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Once the spin finishes, a POST request is made to /api/spins to save the outcome.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Saved Record
narrative_steps.description: Alex navigates to their history to confirm the recent win was logged.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to /history page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The newly added entry appears at the top of the history list with matching timestamp and prize.

requirement_tested: Interactive spin button to trigger wheel rotation
user_goal: To use the SPIN button to initiate a round.

narrative_steps.title: Locating the Spin Button
narrative_steps.description: Emma finds the SPIN button beneath the wheel and prepares to interact.
narrative_steps.action: Identify and hover over the SPIN button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button visually reacts with scaling and shadow effects.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering the Spin
narrative_steps.description: Eager to begin, Emma clicks the button to start the game.
narrative_steps.action: Click the SPIN button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Wheel starts rotating with sound effect and button disables itself until the spin completes.

requirement_tested: Prize list page accessible to all users
user_goal: To browse available prizes without needing authentication.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Public Prize List
narrative_steps.description: Without logging in, Noah clicks on the 'View All Prizes' link.
narrative_steps.action: Click the public prize list link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The prize list page loads without requiring authentication.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Available Rewards
narrative_steps.description: Noah browses the displayed prize cards freely.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll and observe the prize details.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All prize cards render fully and provide clear visuals and descriptions.

requirement_tested: User-specific winning records retrieval and display
user_goal: To view only my own spin history.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Personal History
narrative_steps.description: Lena logs in and goes straight to her win history page.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to /history.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page displays Lena’s exclusive history based on her user identifier.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Privacy of Data
narrative_steps.description: Lena verifies that none of her friend’s wins show up here.
narrative_steps.action: Scan the list for foreign identifiers.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only Lena’s spins are present in the history list.

requirement_tested: Light gray background color applied site-wide
user_goal: To confirm uniformity of background color across all pages.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Homepage Background
narrative_steps.description: Auditor inspects the homepage for proper background color usage.
narrative_steps.action: Open homepage and inspect body styles.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background color is set to #f0f0f0 globally.

narrative_steps.title: Cross-Page Consistency Check
narrative_steps.description: Auditor moves between multiple pages to verify consistent styling.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to /prizes and /history pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each page maintains the same light gray background tone.

requirement_tested: Dark red color used for primary component styling
user_goal: To ensure primary interactive elements use the correct dark red theme.

narrative_steps.title: Checking SPIN Button Styling
narrative_steps.description: Designer examines the most prominent UI element — the SPIN button.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect the SPIN button CSS properties.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button background and border colors match #8B0000.

narrative_steps.title: Validating Other Components
narrative_steps.description: Designer checks other key components like headers and icons.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect headings and interactive elements throughout the app.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All primary styled components consistently apply the dark red color palette.

requirement_tested: Repository package.json configured with install:all script
user_goal: To install dependencies for both frontend and backend simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Running Install Script
narrative_steps.description: Dev clones the repo and runs the convenience install command.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run install:all` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependency trees are installed concurrently without errors.

requirement_tested: Repository package.json configured with dev script
user_goal: To launch both frontend and backend servers together.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Dev Servers
narrative_steps.description: Dev wants to work on features involving both client and server logic.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend dev server starts on one port and backend server on another concurrently.

requirement_tested: Responsive design compatible with desktop and mobile views
user_persona: Mobile user accessing the site on smartphone.
user_goal: To navigate and interact seamlessly on smaller screens.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Site on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Riley opens the site on their phone to try the wheel game.
narrative_steps.action: Load homepage on mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site layout adjusts responsively; wheel and buttons remain usable on small screen.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting via Touchscreen
narrative_steps.description: Riley taps the SPIN button instead of clicking it.
narrative_steps.action: Tap the SPIN button using touch interface.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Same behavior occurs as with mouse click — wheel spins and button disables appropriately.
